channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 17:15 The threat of a shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community.
item.description: 🟡 17:15 The threat of a shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 15:47 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- March Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
